action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deathspitter makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spit Poison
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. {@h}The target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, a creature that fails its saving throw is {@condition blinded} until the end of the deathspitter's next turn.
